sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
	wot1.RECID,
	wot1.CUSTOMER,
	wot1.INVENTDIMID,
	wot1.TOINVENTDIMID,
	wot1.ITEMID,
	wot1.DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
	wot1.INVENTTRANSREFID,
	wot1.OPERATORWORKER,
	wot1.EXPEDITIONSTATUS,
	wot1.OPTIMIZEDPICKING,
	wot1.PRERESERVED,
	wot1.ISRESERVED,
	wot1.RFS_PICKCOMPLETED,
	wot1.CREATEDDATETIME,
	wot1.DLVDATE,
	wot1.EXPEDITIONTIME,
	wot1.INVENTTRANSID,
	wot1.DATAAREAID,
	wot1.ORDERID,
	wot1.ROUTEID,
	wot1.QTY,
	wot1.VOLUME,
	wot1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	wo1.DLVMODE as WMSORDER_DLVMODE,
	wo1.DLVTERM as WMSORDER_DLVTERM,
	wo1.FREIGHTSLIPTYPE as WMSORDER_FREIGHTSLIPTYPE,
	wo1.STATUS as WMSORDER_STATUS,
	wo1.TYPE as WMSORDER_TYPE,
	wo1.FREIGHTZONE as WMSORDER_FREIGHTZONE,
	wo1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as WMSORDER_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	wpr1.PRINTMGMTSITEID as WMSPICKINGROUTE_PRINTMGMTSITEID,
	wpr1.INVENTLOCATIONID as WMSPICKINGROUTE_INVENTLOCATIONID,
	wpr1.PRIORITY as WMSPICKINGROUTE_PRIORITY,
	wpr1.TRANSTYPE as WMSPICKINGROUTE_TRANSTYPE,
	wpr1.SHIPMENTTYPE as WMSPICKINGROUTE_SHIPMENTTYPE,
	wpr1.DLVDATE as WMSPICKINGROUTE_DLVDATE,
	wpr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as WMSPICKINGROUTE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_EXPEDITIONSTATUS,
	tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_FREIGHTSLIPTYPE,
	tet3.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_STATUS,
	tet4.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_TYPE,
	tet5.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_TRANSTYPE,
	tet6.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_SHIPMENTTYPE,
	id1.TIMEZONE as INVENTDIM1_TIMEZONE,
	id1.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTDIM1_INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	id1.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTDIM1_INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	da1.TIMEZONE as DATAAREA1_TIMEZONE,
	tzi1.TIMEBIAS as TIMEZONEINFO1_TIMEBIAS,
	(
		SELECT
			MAX(LastUpdateDate)
		FROM
			(
				VALUES
					(wot1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
					(isnull(wo1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
					(isnull(wpr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
					),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
					)
			) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)
	) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
	dbo.WMSORDERTRANS wot1
	left join dbo.WMSORDER wo1 on wot1.DATAAREAID = wo1.DATAAREAID
	and wot1.ORDERID = wo1.ORDERID
	left join dbo.WMSPICKINGROUTE wpr1 on wot1.DATAAREAID = wpr1.DATAAREAID
	and wot1.ROUTEID = wpr1.PICKINGROUTEID
	left join (
		select
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE,
			max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where
			ENUMNAME = 'WMSExpeditionStatus'
		group by
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE
	) tet1 on wot1.EXPEDITIONSTATUS = tet1.ENUMVALUE
	left join (
		select
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE,
			max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where
			ENUMNAME = 'FreightSlipType'
		group by
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE
	) tet2 on wo1.FREIGHTSLIPTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE
	left join (
		select
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE,
			max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where
			ENUMNAME = 'WMSOrderStatus'
		group by
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE
	) tet3 on wo1.STATUS = tet3.ENUMVALUE
	left join (
		select
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE,
			max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where
			ENUMNAME = 'WMSOrderType'
		group by
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE
	) tet4 on wo1.TYPE = tet4.ENUMVALUE
	left join (
		select
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE,
			max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where
			ENUMNAME = 'InventTransType'
		group by
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE
	) tet5 on wpr1.TRANSTYPE = tet5.ENUMVALUE
	left join (
		select
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE,
			max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where
			ENUMNAME = 'WMSShipmentType'
		group by
			ENUMNAME,
			ENUMVALUE
	) tet6 on wpr1.SHIPMENTTYPE = tet6.ENUMVALUE
	left join (
		select
			id20.DATAAREAID,
			id20.INVENTDIMID,
			max(is20.TIMEZONE) over (partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID) as TIMEZONE,
			max(id20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID) as INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
			max(is20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID) as INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from
			dbo.INVENTDIM id20
			left join dbo.INVENTSITE is20 on id20.DATAAREAID = is20.DATAAREAID
			and id20.INVENTSITEID = is20.SITEID
	) id1 on wot1.DATAAREAID = id1.DATAAREAID
	and wot1.INVENTDIMID = id1.INVENTDIMID
	left join dbo.DATAAREA da1 on wot1.DATAAREAID = da1.ID
	left join dbo.TIMEZONEINFO tzi1 on wot1.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi1.STARTDATE
	and wot1.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi1.ENDDATE
	and isnull(id1.TIMEZONE, da1.TIMEZONE) = tzi1.TIMEZONEID
	where 
	(
		SELECT
			MAX(LastUpdateDate)
		FROM
			(
				VALUES
					(wot1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
					(isnull(wo1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
					(isnull(wpr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
					),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
					)
			) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)
	) > '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'

@Concat('select
	wot1.recid as RECID,
	wot1.customer as CUSTOMER,
	wot1.inventdimid as INVENTDIMID,
	wot1.toinventdimid as TOINVENTDIMID,
	wot1.itemid as ITEMID,
	wot1.deliverypostaladdress as DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
	wot1.inventtransrefid as INVENTTRANSREFID,
	wot1.operatorworker as OPERATORWORKER,
	wot1.expeditionstatus as EXPEDITIONSTATUS,
	wot1.optimizedpicking as OPTIMIZEDPICKING,
	wot1.prereserved as PRERESERVED,
	wot1.isreserved as ISRESERVED,
	'''' as RFS_PICKCOMPLETED,
	wot1.createddatetime as CREATEDDATETIME,
	wot1.dlvdate as DLVDATE,
	wot1.expeditiontime as EXPEDITIONTIME,
	wot1.inventtransid as INVENTTRANSID,
	wot1.dataareaid as DATAAREAID,
	wot1.orderid as ORDERID,
	wot1.routeid as ROUTEID,
	wot1.qty as QTY,
	wot1.volume as VOLUME,
	wot1.modifieddatetime,
	wo1.dlvmode as WMSORDER_DLVMODE,
	wo1.dlvterm as WMSORDER_DLVTERM,
	wo1.freightsliptype as WMSORDER_FREIGHTSLIPTYPE,
	wo1.status as WMSORDER_STATUS,
	wo1.type as WMSORDER_TYPE,
	wo1.freightzone as WMSORDER_FREIGHTZONE,
	wo1.modifieddatetime as WMSORDER_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	wpr1.printmgmtsiteid as WMSPICKINGROUTE_PRINTMGMTSITEID,
	wpr1.inventlocationid as WMSPICKINGROUTE_INVENTLOCATIONID,
	wpr1.priority as WMSPICKINGROUTE_PRIORITY,
	wpr1.transtype as WMSPICKINGROUTE_TRANSTYPE,
	wpr1.shipmenttype as WMSPICKINGROUTE_SHIPMENTTYPE,
	wpr1.dlvdate as WMSPICKINGROUTE_DLVDATE,
	wpr1.modifieddatetime as WMSPICKINGROUTE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_EXPEDITIONSTATUS,
	tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_FREIGHTSLIPTYPE,
	tet3.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_STATUS,
	tet4.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_TYPE,
	tet5.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_TRANSTYPE,
	tet6.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_SHIPMENTTYPE,
	id1.TIMEZONE as INVENTDIM1_TIMEZONE,
	id1.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTDIM1_INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	id1.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTDIM1_INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	da1.timezone as DATAAREA1_TIMEZONE,
	tzi1.timebias as TIMEZONEINFO1_TIMEBIAS,
	(
		SELECT
			MAX(LastUpdateDate)
		FROM
			(
				VALUES
					(wot1.modifieddatetime),
					(isnull(wo1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
					(isnull(wpr1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, ''1950-01-01'')
					),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, ''1950-01-01'')
					)
			) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)
	) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from '
,pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','wmsordertrans wot1
	left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','wmsorder wo1 on wot1.dataareaid = wo1.dataareaid
	and wot1.orderid = wo1.orderid
	left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','wmspickingroute wpr1 on wot1.dataareaid = wpr1.dataareaid
	and wot1.routeid = wpr1.pickingrouteid
	left join (
		select
			enumname,
			enumvalue,
			max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where
			enumname = ''WMSExpeditionStatus''
		group by
			enumname,
			enumvalue
	) tet1 on wot1.expeditionstatus = tet1.enumvalue
	left join (
		select
			enumname,
			enumvalue,
			max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where
			enumname = ''FreightSlipType''
		group by
			enumname,
			enumvalue
	) tet2 on wo1.freightsliptype = tet2.enumvalue
	left join (
		select
			enumname,
			enumvalue,
			max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where
			enumname = ''WMSOrderStatus''
		group by
			enumname,
			enumvalue
	) tet3 on wo1.status = tet3.enumvalue
	left join (
		select
			enumname,
			enumvalue,
			max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where
			enumname = ''WMSOrderType''
		group by
			enumname,
			enumvalue
	) tet4 on wo1.type = tet4.enumvalue
	left join (
		select
			enumname,
			enumvalue,
			max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where
			enumname = ''InventTransType''
		group by
			enumname,
			enumvalue
	) tet5 on wpr1.transtype = tet5.enumvalue
	left join (
		select
			enumname,
			enumvalue,
			max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where
			enumname = ''WMSShipmentType''
		group by
			enumname,
			enumvalue
	) tet6 on wpr1.shipmenttype = tet6.enumvalue
	left join (
		select
			id20.dataareaid,
			id20.inventdimid,
			max(is20.timezone) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as TIMEZONE,
			max(id20.modifieddatetime) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
			max(is20.modifieddatetime) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from
			',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventdim id20
			left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventsite is20 on id20.dataareaid = is20.dataareaid
			and id20.inventsiteid = is20.siteid
	) id1 on wot1.dataareaid = id1.dataareaid
	and wot1.inventdimid = id1.inventdimid
	left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dataarea da1 on wot1.dataareaid = da1.Id
	left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timezoneinfo tzi1 on wot1.createddatetime >= tzi1.startdate
	and wot1.createddatetime < tzi1.enddate
	and isnull(id1.TIMEZONE, da1.timezone) = tzi1.timezoneid
	where 
	(
		SELECT
			MAX(LastUpdateDate)
		FROM
			(
				VALUES
					(wot1.modifieddatetime),
					(isnull(wo1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
					(isnull(wpr1.modifieddatetime, ''1950-01-01'')),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, ''1950-01-01'')
					),
					(
						isnull(id1.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, ''1950-01-01'')
					)
			) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)
	)  > ','''',variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp'),'''')
